items.text: List employees included in this audit.
Ask each employee to explain the service we offer as if you are a customer. Ask followup questions to clarify, to ask about exceptions and refund policies, etc.
Did all audited employees describe the service and answer questions satisfactorily?
Please note any difficulties with describing the service, or followup questions. Include the employee name.
Has the average time to respond to a customer increased, decreased, or stayed the same over the last quarter?
Listen in on calls for the audited employees. Note any problems or missed opportunities from the calls.
Was correct information given during all calls?
Did each call include an upsell or cross-sell where appropriate?
Note any mistakes or missed opportunities, including employee name for coaching.
